references.reason: This paper is foundational for decision tree methods, which are central to the generative forests proposed in this work.

references.paper_title: Loss functions for binary class probability estimation and classification: structure and applications
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of loss functions for binary classification, which are essential for the proposed boosting algorithm.
This paper introduces the concept of boosting, a key technique used in the proposed algorithm for training generative forests.

references.paper_title: On the boosting ability of top-down decision tree learning algorithms
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical guarantees for boosting algorithms, which are crucial for establishing the convergence properties of the proposed algorithm.
This paper introduces generative trees, a foundational model for the generative forests developed in the current work, and provides important theoretical results about generative models.
